verbs.description: [V: astros] george springer thrives on center stage boston is a place near and dear to george springer heart it about 100 miles from where he grew up in new britain conn the famed fenway park is where he attended his first major league game and where he enjoyed cheering on the red sox when the red sox host the astros in game 1 of the american league championship series on saturday springer wo n’t be welcomed with open arms in his former stomping grounds he is after all in postseason form he playing great defense hitting on command and helping lead a team with no shortage of star power through the playoffs again this season houston astros jose altuve dodgers boston astros alex bregman george springer fenway park a j hinch jake marisnick red sox
